subject: RE: Alfa Forni website
preview: Will reply using AC's email. Closing this now

full_threads.body: Will reply using AC's email. Closing this now

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Cindy Valderama

full_threads.body:
AC - DB to update and draft reply and next steps

DB - waiting for next steps from Cindy

DB - @cindy, give us a draft and we can send

Hi Andy,



For the ‘Dealer Locator’ page, can we please title this the ‘Showroom
Locator’. Please list the below:



*Premium dealer *

has showrooms with Alfa on display, technical/warranty team etc



Pizza Ovens R US <https://pizzaovensrusstore.com.au/>



*Dealers*

Online presence only – may or may not have a showroom but currently no
physical Alfa on display



The Pizza Oven Store <https://www.thepizzaovenstore.com.au/>



The BBQ Store <https://www.thebbqstore.com.au/>



Outdoor Living Australia <https://outdoorlivingaustralia.com.au/>



Outback Pizza Ovens <https://outbackpizzaovens.com.au/>



Outdoorhub. <https://outdoorhub.com.au/>



Pizza Warehouse <https://pizzawarehouse.com.au/>



Adelaide Outdoor Kitchens <https://www.adelaideoutdoorkitchens.com.au/>



The Authentic Italian <https://theauthenticitalian.com.au/>





And then the following 4 Harvey Norman stores have Alfa Forni on display:



Gepps Cross

Cairns

Moore Park

Balgowlah



Thanks



*Bonnie Sudirwan*

Marketing Communications Manager

*bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au <bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au>*

www.mayohardware.com.au

0408 <0438557747> 331 966

Customer Service: 1300 360 211

Subject: Re: Alfa Forni website



Hi Bonnie,



Okay thank you - will update and confirm.



Thanks,

Andy

bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au> wrote:

Hi Andy,



Just looking at the list, you have the products under the ‘bases and
complements’ not being developed. We do sell these products in Australia.
We should be including everything except the below:



- Urbe
- Futuro
- Professional
- Limited Edition



Thanks



*Bonnie Sudirwan*

Marketing Communications Manager

*bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au <bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au>*

www.mayohardware.com.au

From: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Monday, July 14, 2025 4:05 PM
To: Bonnie Sudirwan <bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au>
Cc: Cindy Valderama <cindy@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Re: Alfa Forni website



Hi Bonnie,

Thanks for confirming - we’ll use alfaforni.com/en as the structure.

To keep things aligned, our team has mapped out the full sitemap here
<https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EYbsa1SbBMttx0SRWFqrmaeACmJHsdvVOfaS3WSaAXk/edit?gid=0#gid=0>
.

What’s in the sheet:

- All pages to be developed
- Archive/single templates for recipes, products, and blog posts
- A “No Need to Develop” tab for archive pages that were crawled but
won’t be built

Most of these are straightforward builds, so we’ll develop them directly in
Breakdance - no need for a separate design phase.

On timeline:

- We’ll have all pages completed by next week Wednesday (July 23) for
your review
- Once approved, we can go live Thursday or Friday next week (July 24 or
25)

Lastly, could you send through the live site credentials? We’d like to
export the existing posts and import them into staging for a smooth
transition.

Let me know if anything in the sheet needs adjusting before we move forward.

Thanks again,
Andy



On Mon, Jul 14, 2025 at 11:26 AM Bonnie Sudirwan <
bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au> wrote:

Hi Andy,



It should be b. https://www.alfaforni.com/en/



The first website is not owned by Mayo Hardware or Alfa Forni, and we have
been working with the distributor to have the site shut down to prevent
confusing consumers.



Thanks



*Bonnie Sudirwan*

Marketing Communications Manager

*bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au <bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au>*

Hi Bonnie,

Quick one before we lock in the live date: could you confirm which inner
pages we’re building for launch?

The team’s currently unsure whether we’re replicating:
a. https://alfafornipizzaovens.com.au/; or
b. https://www.alfaforni.com/en/

Apologies if this was already covered and we’ve missed it. Once confirmed,
we’ll finalise the ETA and wrap things up.

Thanks,
Andy

Hi Cindy,



Initial feedback on the website:



- Remove the following landing pages and links in the menu bar


- Professional range. We only have Domestic available in Australia
- Remove Urbe from the Domestic menu (Urbe - The electric pizza oven
by Alfa Forni
<https://www.alfaforni.com/it/prodotto/urbe-forno-per-pizza-elettrico/>
)


- The Urbe is also not available in Australia – so any content related
to this product will need to be removed


- Change ‘Request a Quote’ to ‘Contact Us’ anywhere this can be found
throughout the website


-
-


- Delete this page Limited Edition - I colori d'Italia | Alfa Forni
<https://www.alfaforni.com/en/limited-edition-i-colori-di-italia/>
- Alfa Academy | Take Cooking to a whole new level - Alfa Forni
<https://www.alfaforni.com/en/courses-and-masterclasses/> – remove
‘On the Road’ content, keep ‘On Air’ content
- Remove download link for the Professional PDF


-


- Remove ‘X’ and Vimeo.
- Also change details to Mayo Hardware. You may keep the email
address as is.


- Mayo Hardware
4 Secombe Pl, Moorebank NSW 2200
1300 360 211


-
